abstract: Boy Scouts of America's executive committee unanimously approves resolution to end blanket prohibition on gay adult leaders, and allow individual scout units to set their own approach to issue.
lead_paragraph: The executive committee of the Boy Scouts of America has unanimously approved a resolution that would end the organization’s blanket ban on gay adult leaders and let scout units set their own policy on the issue.

headline.main: Boy Scouts Take a Step Toward Allowing Gay Leaders
headline.print_headline: Boy Scouts Take a Step Toward Allowing Gay Leaders

snippet: The executive committee of the Boy Scouts of America has unanimously approved a resolution that would end the organization’s blanket ban on gay adult leaders and let scout units set their own policy on the issue.
